name: Guess The 'Queer As Folk' Character Quiz | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: I am a good-hearted but controlling chiropractor who fell in love with Michael. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
David Cameron.

	David (Chris Potter) and Michael were together for most of the first season, but David was very possessive and manipulative of Michael. They moved to Portland, Oregon together for a short time, but soon broke up and Michael returned to Pittsburgh.

questions.text: I am a sexy advertising agent and the hottest stud on Liberty Avenue. There are a few select people that I really care about, but mostly, I just look out for myself. Who am I?
questions.correct: Brian Kinney & Brian & Brian Kenny & Kinney & Kenny & Brian Kinny & Kinny
questions.explanation:
Brian Kinney & Brian & Brian Kenny & Kinney & Kenny & Brian Kinny & Kinny.

	Brian (Gale Harold) doesn't do boyfriends, although many people (Justin and Michael especially) would be glad to fill that position. He has no apologies or regrets for anything he does, but would do anything for his best friend Michael, his young paramour Justin, his lesbian college pal Lindsay, and his son Gus.

questions.text: I am a feisty Jewish lawyer who is in love with Lindsay and is co-mother to our son Gus. I can't stand Brian and hate the way he gets in the middle of my relationship. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Melanie Marcus.

	Melanie (Michelle Clunie) loves Lindsay and Gus, and would do anything for them. She has a wry and sarcastic sense of humor and is very cynical. She is close friends with Ted.

questions.text: I am a troubled young man suffering an addiction to crystal meth. I was responsible for Ted's coma, and he later tried to help me overcome my addiction, but I ran away from rehab. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Blake.

	Blake (Dean Armstrong) and Ted were getting closer and Ted convinced Blake to enter rehab. Blake obviously decided he couldn't handle it and fled the hospital.

questions.text: I am a loud, proud, FABULOUSLY dressed gay man. Some might even call me flamboyant! Under my queeny exterior, however, is a loyal and devoted friend. I recently fell in love with my best friend. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Emmett Honeycutt & Emmett.

	Although he may be the campiest of the boys, Emmett (Peter Paige) is certainly the most secure with himself and likely the least self-involved.

questions.text: I am Justin's best girl friend who has always harbored a secret crush on him. I have helped him in his pursuit of Brian and always provide a shoulder for him to come to. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Daphne Chanders.

	Daphne (Makyla Smith) has been Justin's best friend for a long time. She has always had a crush on him, and even asked him to take her virginity.

questions.text: I am a self-conscious and cynical former accountant. I am currently in a relationship with Emmett, but used to be in love with Michael and hate to see Brian manipulate him. I am a bit older than the rest of the guys and often feel out of place. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ted Schmidt.

	Ted (Scott Lowell) is very self-conscious and also very sad. He has a problem in that he always chases after cute, young men that seem to reject him for other cute, young men. He has always had a crush on Michael, but has gotten over it and is now in love with Emmett.

questions.text: I am a comic-book loving, boy-next-door. I am secretly in love with Brian, but the men I date usually seem to fit into the hunky, scholarly, older-man category. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Michael Novotny.

	Michael (Hal Sparks) is a devoted, loyal friend. His mom, Debbie, is embarrassingly proud of his sexuality. He sometimes has trouble standing up for himself, but usually comes out on top (no pun intended), with help from his best friends Brian, Emmett, and Ted.

questions.text: I am Michael's proud mom. I am the hen mother for the boys, and let Justin stay with me for a while. I am all heart and look for the best in everyone. I run the Liberty Diner. Who am I?
questions.correct: Debbie Novotny & Debbie & Deb Novotny & Deb
questions.explanation:
Debbie Novotny & Debbie & Deb Novotny & Deb.

	Debbie (Sharon Gless) is wildly supportive of her son's lifestyle, sometimes to the point of embarrassing him. She wants the best for everyone. She has a unique style of dress, wearing a bright red wig and vibrantly colored t-shirts. Her waitressing uniform is adorned with colorful buttons.

questions.text: I am the proud mother of Gus and the live-in partner of Melanie. I would do anything for Melanie, Gus, and my friend Brian, and often have to act as the mediator between Mel and Brian. I am an art teacher and very soft-spoken. Who am I?
questions.correct: Lindsay Peterson & Lindsay & Lindsey & Lindsey Peterson
questions.explanation:
Lindsay Peterson & Lindsay & Lindsey & Lindsey Peterson.

	Lindsay (Thea Gill) looks like a young Grace Kelly. She loves her family more than anything, and tries to see the best side to everything. The only things she can't stand are when her parents treat her badly for being gay and when Melanie and Brian bicker.

questions.text: I was 17 years old when I  fell in love with Brian after a one-night stand, but recently dumped him for someone else. I am artistic and very gutsy, and Debbie calls me 'Sunshine'. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Justin Taylor.

	Justin (Randy Harrison) is just finding his place in the world, and used to think that place was by Brian's side, until he met the sensitive violinist Ethan.

questions.text: I am a professor who has taken an interest in Michael. I enjoy dancing and doing yoga. I'm practically perfect. There's only one problem: I'm HIV-positive. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ben Bruckner.

	Ben (Robert Gant) is seemingly perfect, and he really likes Michael. Michael's friends and family, however, aren't so keen on him dating Ben.

questions.text: I am Debbie's brother who has AIDS and is living every day to its fullest. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Vic Grassi.

	Vic (Jack Wetherall) has AIDS, but seems to be surviving. He lives with Debbie, who takes care of him.

questions.text: I am a sensitive violinist who fell in love with Justin and won him away from Brian. and then betrayed him. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ethan Gold.

	Ethan (Fabrizio Filippo) was a handsome musician who won Justin over with his romantic words and soulful music. But, when Ethan cheated on him, Justin was done, and returned to Brian.

questions.text: I am Justin's supportive mother. Who am I?
questions.correct: Jennifer Taylor & Jen Taylor & Jennifer & Jen
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Taylor & Jen Taylor & Jennifer & Jen.

	Jennifer (Sherry Miller) divorced her homophobic husband and is gradually learning to accept her son's sexuality and appreciate his uniqueness.
